bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, disc-specific, 1-3/8" lower bearing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, disc-specific monocoque fork, carbon steerer and crown for 1-3/8" lower bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower integrated sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, 20mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Specialized Expert Pro-Set, 3D forged aluminum, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized CX Comp Shallow Bend, 6061 alloy, 125mm drop, 70mm reach
SRAM, DoubleTap, 10-speed, integrated hydraulic brake system
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Body Geometry Phenom Comp, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 143mm
S-Works FACT carbon CG-R, single bolt, 27.2mm
Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owner's manual
